full_summary:
=====================================

### Invitation to Bid: Responsive Maintenance Services

#### Contract Title and Reference Information

*   Contract title: Responsive Maintenance Services
*   Reference number: WS4213461187-Doc4213504317
*   Solicitation number: WS4213461187
*   Amendment number: 4
*   Publication date: December 1, 2023
*   Closing date: February 2, 2024 (at 2:00 PM EST)

#### Contract Description

The Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for a contract to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio.

#### Supporting Documentation and Bid Submission Details

Bidder's documents and supporting documentation must be submitted by February 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST, EST (Eastern Standard). Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

#### Technical and Commercial Evaluation Criteria

Technical and commercial evaluation criteria for the contract include the lowest price.

#### Excluded Bidders

Bidders must confirm their attendance to the optional teleconference scheduled by December 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

#### Language of Evaluation

Bids will be evaluated using the English language. 

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents and instructions can be found on the Ariba Discovery website at: 

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18167410?extsite=MTgxNjc0MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

#### Contact Information

For further information regarding the contract or tender process, please contact the Contracting Authority, Christine Seguin, at the following contact information:

Christine.Seguin@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA

#### Trade Agreements

This contract complies with the amended Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other relevant trade agreements.

#### Contract Location

The contract is to be executed in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.

#### Contract End Date

The end date of the contract is not specified in this announcement.
